page.shortlink: api qrcode namespace creator class generate png file method
page.description: GeneratePngFile creates a .PNG file containing a QRCode image.
page.prototype: PUBLIC STATIC GeneratePngFile AS L (text AS C, filename AS C, correctionLevel AS C)

argument.name: correctionLevel AS C
argument.description: Correction level can be L,M,Q or H (L=7%, M=15%, Q=25%, H=30%). See [QRCode Namespace] for more information.
